refnamediv.refpurpose: Media type to use in generated pages

refsection.para: This parameter specifies the media type that should be used by the chunking stylesheet. Not all processors support specification of this parameter.
This parameter specifies the media type that should be used by the chunking stylesheet. This should be one from those defined in [RFC2045] and [RFC2046]

note.para: This parameter is documented here, but the declaration is actually in the chunker.xsl stylesheet module.
It must be one from html, xml or text
